text: María Ribera (born July 8, 1986) is a Spanish rugby sevens player. She competes for the Spanish women's national rugby sevens team and was included in their squad to the 2016 Summer Olympics. She was also part of the team that won the final Olympic qualification tournament in Dublin, Ireland. Ribera also played at the 2013 Rugby World Cup Sevens in Russia. == References == == External links == * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Spain international women's rugby union players Category:Spain international women's rugby sevens players Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of Spain Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics
title: María Ribera
